text: Nicholas Joseph "Nick" Begich Sr. (April 6, 1932 in Eveleth, Minnesota - October 16, 1972 in Alaska) was an American politician of the Democratic Party. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives for Alaska from 1971 to 1972. He was also a member of the Alaska Senate from 1962 to 1970. Begich died (probably) in an aircraft accident at the age of 40. He was declared dead in absentia in December 1972. ==Related pages== *List of people who disappeared mysteriously: 1910â€“1990 == References == * 100years.akleg.gov Category:1932 births Category:1972 deaths Category:People declared dead in absentia Category:Aviation deaths in the United States Category:Missing American people Category:Politicians from Minnesota Category:United States representatives from Alaska Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:20th-century American politicians
title: Nick Begich Sr.
